title: Remarks by President George W. Bush at the Global Women’s Network Summit (George W Bush ...
text: ( Source : George W Bush Presidential Center ) Thank you , Margaret , for that fine introduction. The purpose of this summit is to help and encourage women to be leaders in their communities, and Margaret Spellings is a strong leader for the
